snippet.title: SNES Longplay [209] Dragon Quest V (part 01 of 10)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Valis77

Where do i begin? Well, this is one of many favorites DQ games in the series. Imagine fighting monsters and capturing them to fight along side you...hmm reminds me of another game that has the same concept.....anyways. I can see why its good. This is the second story of the Zenithia Castle Saga. Im not gonna elaborate much on the story. Its your typical "Go Save/Find/Avenge your parents death cliche. Its also has more then just the obvious. As for my recording, i did some off screen leveling and you  know the drill guys. At the end screen i had to reset the game because it would not continue on the The End Screen. But the bonus dungeon, i had to show it to make the game as complete as i possibly can. Oh well Enjoy! -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
